trends: There has been one other sighting in Ronan
There were no other sightings in Ronan on or around February 2nd 2012
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was working at the hospital in Ronan and took a break to check my Facebook status when a friend of mine posted that she had been watching a UFO. I went to look for myself and took a video of it.
Summary: It would dim as the hours went by, looked farther away. Did a drunken zagging pattern continuously and lights would get dim and bright.
